entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Midland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:28 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.9°C

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and local snow squalls. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:54 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and local snow squalls ending late in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:54 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
